scripts.cdk:deploy.bootstrap: cd infrastructure/aws-cdk && npm install && npm run bootstrap
scripts.cdk:deploy: cd infrastructure/aws-cdk && npm run cdk deploy -- -c stack_name="${STACK_NAME:-}" --all --require-approval never
scripts.cdk:destroy: cd infrastructure/aws-cdk && npm run cdk destroy -- -c stack_name="${STACK_NAME:-}" --all
scripts.tf:deploy.bootstrap: cd infrastructure/terraform/src && terraform init && terraform validate && terraform plan
